title: Russia detains suspect in car bomb attack that killed general
snippets: The FSB say they detained a "Ukrainian special services agent". Kyiv has not commented on the attack.
titles: Russia detains suspect in car bomb attack that killed general
summary: The FSB announced the detention of an individual they claim is an agent of the Ukrainian special services. As of the latest updates, there has been no comment from Kyiv regarding the incident.

title: Russia claims it has regained full control of Kursk from Ukraine
snippets: Ukraine denies Russian claims it has been forced out of the border region.
titles: Russia claims it has regained full control of Kursk from Ukraine
summary: Ukraine has refuted Russian allegations that its forces have been expelled from a disputed border area. Despite Russia's claims of forcing Ukrainian troops to retreat, Ukraine maintains control over the region in question. The situation remains tense, with both sides holding their positions.

title: Moment driver sees huge explosion rip through Iran port
snippets: At least four people have been killed and 500 more injured in Bandar Abbas.
titles: Moment driver sees huge explosion rip through Iran port
summary: At least four individuals lost their lives, and 500 others sustained injuries in Bandar Abbas. The incident has been confirmed by local authorities, who are currently investigating the situation. Further details regarding the cause and aftermath are pending.

title: Thirteen killed, dozens under rubble as Israel bombs Gaza amid food crisis
snippets: Entire Strip, with a population of two million people, may be on the brink of famine as WFP runs out of supplies.
titles: Thirteen killed, dozens under rubble as Israel bombs Gaza amid food crisis
summary: The Strip, home to two million residents, faces a potential famine crisis as the World Food Programme (WFP) reports running out of supplies. This situation puts the population at significant risk of food insecurity.

title: Australia's universal healthcare is crumbling. Can it be saved?
snippets: More and more Australians, regardless of where they live, are delaying or going without the care they need.
titles: Australia's universal healthcare is crumbling. Can it be saved?
summary: A growing number of Australians across various regions are postponing or foregoing necessary healthcare. This trend indicates a significant issue in the accessibility or affordability of healthcare services in the country.

title: 2025 NFL Draft: Ohio State falls 1 pick shy of modern era record for single draft despite hitting 14 with 72 selections left
snippets: Georgia set the record in 2022 with 15 players drafted, and the Buckeyes mounted a serious threat to it.
titles: 2025 NFL Draft: Ohio State falls 1 pick shy of modern era record for single draft despite hitting 14 with 72 selections left
summary: In 2022, Georgia established a new record by having 15 of its players selected in the NFL draft. The Ohio State Buckeyes were seen as a strong contender to challenge this record.

title: Emotional Jeb Burton questions NASCAR decision, claims he won Xfinity race
snippets: Jeb Burton broke down into tears following the NASCAR Xfinity race at Talladega after a much-needed victory slipped through his fingertips
titles: Emotional Jeb Burton questions NASCAR decision, claims he won Xfinity race
summary: Jeb Burton became emotional after narrowly missing a victory in the NASCAR Xfinity race at Talladega, expressing his disappointment as the win he urgently needed eluded him.

title: Video: UFC's Dustin Poirier makes NFL Draft selection for New Orleans Saints
snippets: It's been a big couple days for Dustin Poirier and the connection to his home state of Lousiana.
titles: Video: UFC's Dustin Poirier makes NFL Draft selection for New Orleans Saints
summary: Dustin Poirier has had significant recent events linking him to his home state of Louisiana. However, the summary does not specify the nature or outcomes of these events.

title: Grading all 32 teams’ 2025 NFL Drafts, from the Raiders rare 'A' to whatever the Browns are doing
snippets: Pete Carroll's first draft with the Raiders looks like their best haul in years. The Browns, on the other hand, uh, sure made a lot of picks?
titles: Grading all 32 teams’ 2025 NFL Drafts, from the Raiders rare 'A' to whatever the Browns are doing
summary: Pete Carroll's initial draft with the Raiders is widely regarded as their most successful in recent years, showcasing promising talent and strategic selections. Conversely, the Browns' draft strategy has drawn attention for its quantity of picks, with the effectiveness of their choices remaining a topic of discussion.

title: UFC on ESPN 66 video: Malcolm Wellmaker's vicious KO sends Cameron Saaiman airborne
snippets: Malcolm Wellmaker knocked Cameron Saaiman off his feet with a brutal punch to win his debut and stay unbeaten at UFC Kansas City.
titles: UFC on ESPN 66 video: Malcolm Wellmaker's vicious KO sends Cameron Saaiman airborne
summary: In his debut match at UFC Kansas City, Malcolm Wellmaker achieved victory over Cameron Saaiman with a powerful punch that knocked Saaiman off his feet. This win keeps Wellmaker's unbeaten record intact.

title: Republicans plan to scrap US audit regulator
snippets: Proposal to fold the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board into the SEC will boost Donald Trump’s deregulatory agenda
titles: Republicans plan to scrap US audit regulator
summary: A proposal has been made to integrate the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) into the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). This move is seen as a step towards advancing former President Donald Trump's agenda of reducing regulatory burdens on businesses.

title: China seizes disputed reef in the South China Sea
snippets: Sandy Cay is just kilometres from the Philippines’ military outpost at Thitu Island
titles: China seizes disputed reef in the South China Sea
summary: Sandy Cay, located just kilometres away from the Philippines' military outpost at Thitu Island, is a point of geographical and strategic interest due to its proximity to the Philippine military base.

title: Kremlin claims to have pushed Ukraine out of Kursk as Trump criticises Putin
snippets: Russia acknowledges presence of North Korean troops on the ground for the first time
titles: Kremlin claims to have pushed Ukraine out of Kursk as Trump criticises Putin
summary: For the first time, Russia has officially acknowledged the presence of North Korean troops on its territory. This significant development marks a new phase in the relationship between Russia and North Korea, but the specific details regarding the purpose or activities of these troops were not disclosed in the announcement.

title: Trump and Zelenskyy hold ‘productive’ discussion at Pope’s funeral
snippets: World leaders gathered in Rome as US and Ukrainian presidents met for first time since Oval Office row
titles: Trump and Zelenskyy hold ‘productive’ discussion at Pope’s funeral
summary: World leaders convened in Rome, marking the first meeting between the US and Ukrainian presidents since their disagreement in the Oval Office. This gathering signifies a step towards diplomatic engagement following the recent tensions.

title: DeepMind UK staff seek to unionise and challenge defence deals and Israel links
snippets: Move by employees at Google’s AI arm follows discontent after weapons and surveillance pledge is dropped
titles: DeepMind UK staff seek to unionise and challenge defence deals and Israel links
summary: Employees at Google's AI division have expressed dissatisfaction and taken action following the company's decision to abandon a pledge against using its technology for weapons and surveillance purposes. This move indicates a significant shift in the ethical stance of the organization and has led to internal unrest among the staff.

title: Less intensive farming works best for agricultural soil
snippets: The less intensively you manage the soil, the better the soil can function. Such as not plowing as often or using more grass-clover mixtures as cover crops. Surprisingly, it applies to both conventional and organic farming.
titles: Less intensive farming works best for agricultural soil
summary: Research indicates that minimal soil management improves its functionality, benefiting both conventional and organic farming methods. Practices like reducing plowing frequency and incorporating grass-clover mixtures as cover crops are recommended for healthier soil.
